name: Lavalink On Heroku
description: A test Heroku app to deploy your own lavalink server.

PASS.description: Set this for authorization for your lavalink server. (default: youshallnotpass)

PORT.description: The port of the Lavalink server. (default: 2333)

KEEP_ALIVE.description: Whether to keep the server alive 24/7 (may cost dyno hours).
